name: nabetex2svg-npm
description: create svg file from tex using mathjax-node module.

scripts.sample: tsc && node build/Release/main.js -t sample/sample.tex -s sample/s0.jsonc -o sample/sample.svg && node build/Release/main.js -t sample/日本語を含む.tex -s sample/s0.jsonc -o sample/日本語を含む.svg

author: NABETANi Takenori
